name: Infernalis
description:
Development Information:

The Game is made out of Free Assets only. It was created with Unity and written in C#. It has been created for the Diploma in Games Programming at the SAE Institute in Munich.

It was a Team Project that was created with 3 other People mentioned in the Credits of the Game and the duration of the Development was approximately 3-5 Weeks. This is a result of around 13 months of learning  Game Developing, Unity and C#. It is the 5th Project and the biggest Project i've done until than.

Game Information:

Infernalis is a Hack’n’Slay with tiny RPG Elements, where the Player is able to choose his own Skillset. The Goal of the game is to beat all enemies on the Path that spawns out of Portal to get to the final Boss and deafeat him. The Main Feature of the game is the usage of Skills only and those Skills can be changed the whenever your want(except you got Cooldown on them).

At the beginning you have a tiny Tutorial that explains the basics and controls of the Game since those are not that self explaining.

Language of the Game: English only

Playtime: Approximatly 15-25Min
